quote: The reason why you know more funny dudes than funny chicks is that dudes are funnier than chicks. If my daughter has a mediocre sense of humor, I'm just gonna tell her, 'Be a staff writer for a sitcom. quote: Sometimes a scene may be about one thing, and it may end up still being about that, but the emotionality of it comes from somewhere else, or the humor of it comes from somewhere else, and it gives it that real-life quality.

quote: You know, I'm Australian, and we have got the worst sense of humor. We are cruel to each other.

quote: I have wit in my work and a sense of humor, but I do not use irony in any way.

quote: I wish I could be as thin as Jessica Simpson. I think she looks gorgeous! I have had Jessica on my show several times, and I can tell you that girl is genuine and funny with a great self-deprecating sense of humor.

quote: Humor can be an incredible lacerating and effective weapon. And that is the way I use it.

quote: Colombian humor is very black, very sarcastic.

quote: I have a dark sense of humor.

quote: I'm not an expert on the Malaysian sense of humor.

quote: However, frat-boy humor is funny and it always will be.

quote: My dad instilled in me a great sense of humor. I wasn't bullied at school because my outward attitude was confident, and that helps.

quote: Joe Barbera's s always complaining that he can't get humor into cartoons anymore. Just do it. You've got your money. Why do they let the networks run their lives?

quote: A farce, or slapstick humor, does well universally.

quote: Sure, the comedians who swear or use scatological humor can get laughs, but they're uncomfortable laughs.
name: John Ratzenberger

quote: I think up until the point when we started in the business, which was in the early '70s, most of the humor was political. The smart humor was political satire.

quote: Do feminists have a sense of humor? Yes.

quote: I genuinely liked all of the cast members very much. Steve had a wicked sense of humor. I remember Russell coming to my rescue, once. I watched Eric evolve before everyone's eyes. Maurice loved what he did, so. He treated his character with respect, down to the costuming.

quote: Confidence and a good sense of humor can usually win a chick over.

quote: I liked the humor of it, I've always enjoyed a sense of humor in God and in religion and in spirituality.

quote: I don't think I could ever do a network sitcom because the humor is often based on some trite circumstance. I don't want to be a part of a show where it's mostly about coming up with the jokes.

quote: Roosevelt's humor was broad, his manner friendly. Of wit there was little of philosophy, none. What did he possess? Intuition, inspiration, love of adventure.

quote: But if you don't watch me, I will try and sneak in some humor. I see humor everywhere in life around me.

quote: I was a little shocked at how adult some of the humor was, because I was never that into animation before and when I watched 'Shrek' I really laughed out loud.

quote: I'm not just a big-haired redhead country singer who dresses flamboyantly, has this wicked sense of humor and wears rhinestones.

name: Will Durst

quote: Academics tend to have wonderfully infantile senses of humor.
